errors.bad_response: Server error, please try again later
errors.bad_request: Bad request, please notify the administrator

login_form.sign_in_description: Sign in to access your account settings

account_settings.title: Account settings
account_settings.change_password_description: Setting a new password for your account will affect all connected services:
account_settings.password_minimum_age: Too little time has passed since the last password change
account_settings.password_length: Password must be at least {count} characters long
account_settings.password_uppercase: Password must at least have a uppercase character | Password must at least have {count} uppercase characters
account_settings.password_lowercase: Password must at least have a lowercase character | Password must at least have {count} lowercase characters
account_settings.password_number: Password must at least have a number | Password must at least have {count} numbers
account_settings.password_special: Password must at least have a special character | Password must at least have {count} special characters
account_settings.generic_error: Can't change password right now, please try again later
account_settings.password_changed_description: The password has been changed successfully
account_settings.minimum_number: At least {count} number (0-9) | At least {count} numbers (0-9)
account_settings.minimum_special: At least {count} special character (!{'@'}#^&_?-) | At least {count} special characters (!{'@'}#^&_?-)

user_manager.title: Users & groups
user_manager.group_delete_modal_description: Are you sure you want to delete group "{name}"? The action is irreversible.
user_manager.group_deleted_description: The group has been deleted successfully
user_manager.group_created_description: The group has been created successfully
user_manager.group_edited_description: The group has been edited successfully
user_manager.user_delete_modal_description: Are you sure you want to delete user "{name}"? The action is irreversible.
user_manager.user_deleted_description: The user has been deleted successfully
